posts.title: How sfc9982 helped me solve hexo problem
posts.text: How sfc9982 helped me solve hexo problem I used removeif/hexo-theme-amazing He STFW and RTFM then he solved it. I deeply apperciate his generous assistance.His blog is at googles.plus
